title: Minecraft 主机版 TU57/CU49/1.56/1.57/Patch 27/Patch 7 发布
author: cc7w
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1345979462 于 2017-8-29 18:19 编辑 
主机版即Xbox 360，Xbox One版，PlayStation 3/4/Vita版，WiiU版，Switch版，由4J Studios为Mojang开发。 迎接新的正式版吧！ 转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。  http://www.minecraftforum.net/fo ... -update-change-logs


Added Glide Myths Track Pack; Drift through the clouds of Icarus, dive into conflict in Excalibur, and ride with the Kelpies in Celts.增加滑翔神话追踪包，穿过伊卡洛斯之云，潜入亚瑟王的战斗中，在凯尔特骑凯尔派吧！Added "Strangers - Biome Settlers 3" Skin Pack.增加“Strangers - Biome Settlers 3”皮肤包Fixed slow moving mobs in water.修复水中怪物移动速度缓慢的问题Endermen and Endermites should always be hostile to each other.末影人和末影螨现在互相敌对了Polar Bears should not attack the player when in peaceful mode.北极熊在和平模式不攻击玩家了Wither Skeletons no longer fear daylight, and will attack anything that lives.凋灵骷髅不会害怕日光了，且会攻击任何活着的生物Zombie Horses and Skeleton Horses can now be tamed and leashed.僵尸马和骷髅马现在可以驯服和用栓绳拴住Skeletons shouldn't attack Village Golems.骷髅现在不攻击铁傀儡了Strays now flee from Wolves.流髑现在会从狼面前逃跑Wolves should not become hostile against mobs that they can't directly see.狼现在不会对不能直接看见的怪物敌对了Fix for Farmer Villagers not planting seeds often enough.修复农夫村民种植种子不够勤的问题Crafting any kind of Boat now requires a Wooden Shovel.合成任何种类的船现在都需要木锹了String can now be crafted from Web.蜘蛛网可以合成线了Purpur Stairs and Slabs can now be crafted from both Purpur Blocks and Pillars.紫珀楼梯和半砖现在可以用紫珀方块和紫珀柱子合成了Stone Slabs, Redstone Repeaters, and Redstone Comparators can now be crafted from Stone, Granite, Andesite, Diorite, and their Polished variants.石半砖，红石中继器和红石比较器现在能用石头，花岗岩，安山岩和闪长岩以及对应的磨制种类合成了Observers should register changes to Item Frames.侦测器可以检测物品展示框的变化了Observers should register changes to Doors.侦测器可以检测门的变化了Observers should register changes to Flower Pots.侦测器可以检测花盆的变化了Observers should not output extra signals for fire block state changes.侦测器现在不会在方块状态改变时输出额外的信号了Observers should not output multiple signals when lava or water is place in front of them.侦测器在其前方放置水或岩浆时不会输出多个信号了Pistons can now push Daylight Sensors.活塞现在可以推动阳光传感器了Potion durations have changed.药水的持续时间改了Fixed area in the Mini Game Lobby that caused players to become invulnerable in the Mini Game if they were in this location when the round started.修复如果玩家在小游戏大厅区域中，在游戏开始时会导致玩家在小游戏中变无敌的问题Fix for MCCE-5523 - Pick Block in Creative.修复创造模式选择方块的问题Fix for MCCE-5549 - Hotbar is not centered in splitscreen battle..修复快捷栏没有在分屏幕战斗中居中的问题Fix for MCCE-2000 - Zombies get stuck in water.修复僵尸卡在水中的问题Fix for MCCE-2868 - Levitation effect all in Capitals.修复大写字母的悬浮问题Fix for MCCE-5539 - Unable to earn Free Diver Achievement.修复不能获得自由潜水员成就的问题
  外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪 Mojang官方博客（英文）4JStudios的Twitter（英文，内地需翻墙）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）官方更新日志（英文）英语 Minecraft Wiki的Console Edition version history页面（英文，更新条目详细）中文 Minecraft Wiki的主机版版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细）
